data.prayer: Lord, use Google search to lead people in England, United Kingdom to the gospel today.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of England, United Kingdom
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: God, guide the 4,193,340 believers in England to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.

data.section_summary: On average, 54 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in England, United Kingdom.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in England, United Kingdom a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Lord, please give the 4,193,340 believers in the state of England the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that they might know you better.
data.verse: I keep asking that the God of our Lord Jesus Christ, the glorious Father, may give you the Spirit of wisdom and revelation, so that you may know him better.

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Jew, Yahudic people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Jew, Yahudic people.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of England, United Kingdom that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, defend the church in the state of England against being inward-focused.
data.verse: The Spirit of the Sovereign LORD is on me, because the LORD has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor. He has sent me to bind up the brokenhearted, to proclaim freedom for the captives and release from darkness for the prisoners.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of England, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.
